named-query.name: obterCliente
named-query.query: select c from Cliente c where c.nome like :nome

named-query.name: obterCompra
named-query.query: select distinct u from Compra u where u.paga like :paga

named-query.name: obterFornecedor
named-query.query: select u from Fornecedor u where u.desc like :desc

named-query.name: obterFuncionario
named-query.query: select u from Funcionario u where u.nome like :nome

named-query.name: obterItemCompra
named-query.query: select u from ItemCompra u where u.codi like :compra

named-query.name: obterProduto
named-query.query: select u from Produto u where u.desc like :desc

named-query.name: obterUsuario
named-query.query: select u from Usuario u where u.nome like :nome
